CustomField.inlineHelpText: Junior, if the user has spent less than 100 euros in the last twelve months. Member, if the user has spent between 100 and 250 euros in the last twelve months. Elite, if the user has spent between 250 and 700 euros in the last twelve months. Loyal, if the user has spent more than 700 euros in the last twelve months.
CustomField.label: Monetary
